title: Bliss OS developer brings Android 12L your x86 PC
content:
Thanks to the open source nature of Android, people can tailor the OS exactly to their needs. For example, the developers of Bliss ROMs maintain a version of Android known as Bliss OS for the classic x86 platform. The project has now hit its next milestone, as the first Android 12L beta release that people

The post Bliss OS developer brings Android 12L your x86 PC appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Bliss OS, an Android ROM for PC, releases the first beta version of Android 12L in the form of a custom Android-x86 build. Give it a go!
